pullrequest.title: Save models' material and meshes when logging targeting gazebo7

content.raw:
There are some test failures related to the man page because it expects the help string to match some of the man-page content:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/677/testReport/(root)/ManTest/gazebo/
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/677/testReport/(root)/ManTest/gzserver/

pull request #2797 may have the same issue
